text:
OpenMail | Venice, CA | ONSITE

OpenMail is hiring! We're an adtech startup based in Venice, CA.

Open roles: Product manager Data Engineer (Python) DevOps Engineer (AWS-based infrastructure, Python) Frontend Engineer (JS, Angular) Frontend Engineer (HTML/CSS) QA Automation Engineer (Python) Business Analyst (SQL, Excel)

Some of the perks: Office two blocks from the beach Great benefits: 100% Medical, Dental and Vision coverage for you and your family

Check out www.openmail.com/careers for more info.
